name: groningen-aov-zscore
description: Progressive Web App for calculating aortic annulus diameter z-scores using the Groningen GAM model

scripts.test: npm run test:syntax && npm run test:data
scripts.test:syntax: node -c sw.js && echo '✅ Service worker syntax valid'
scripts.validate: npm run validate:json && npm run validate:manifest && npm run validate:sw
scripts.validate:manifest: node -e "const fs=require('fs');if(fs.existsSync('manifest.json')){const m=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('manifest.json','utf8'));['name','short_name','start_url','display','icons'].forEach(f=>{if(!m[f])throw new Error('Missing: '+f)});console.log('✅ Manifest valid')}else{console.log('⚠️  manifest.json not found')}"
scripts.validate:sw: node -c sw.js && echo '✅ Service worker syntax valid'
scripts.icons:generate: echo 'Install sharp: npm install --save-dev sharp, then create icons from source'

author: Your Team
